text: Henri Jean Paul Balinghasay Inting (born September 4, 1957) is the 183rd Supreme Court Associate Justice. He was appointed by President Rodrigo Duterte replacing then-Associate Justice and then-Chief Justice Lucas Bersamin. == Education == He took his Bachelor of Science degree in Psychology at the University of San Carlos in Cebu City in 1978. Four years later, he earned his Bachelor of Laws degree at the Ateneo de Davao University, where he also finished his elementary and secondary education. == Legal and judicial career == He was appointed to the Court of Appeals of the Philippines on September 14, 2012. === Supreme Court appointment === In May 2019 Inting was appointed by President Rodrigo Duterte as Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines to replace then-Associate Justice Lucas Bersamin who was appointed Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines on November 28, 2018. == References == Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of the Philippines Category:Justices of the Court of Appeals of the Philippines Category:Filipino judges Category:Filipino lawyers Category:Ateneo de Davao University alumni
title: Henri Jean Paul Inting
